name: Juan Barcenas
coverLetter: Hello, my name is Juan and I've been in this industry for about 2yrs. I started off trimming at a dispensary in downtown LA then migrated to a couple of other shops. Eventually I migrated up north to work on a couple cannabis farms where i developed skills such as harvesting, transplanting, growing, maintaining and further improved my trimming. Depending on quality and demands, I can trim 2-3 pounds within a days work. I can also provide other services such as mold, pest and plague detecting. Looking for housing and  if not possible I'm willing to camp.
